item.description:
Join us for the Second Annual FIREFest as they close down East Pearl Street in Nashua, New Hampshire for a Celebration of the Visual, Performing, Culinary and Healing Arts in the Heart of Downtown, Nashua.

FIREfest Nashua is a collaborative effort of The City of Nashua, independent gallery owners, visual, performing, culinary and healing artists, and arts organizations held during the height of the Fall Foliage season when all of the trees are on FIRE!

East Pearl Street will be closed to vehicle traffic from 2pm to 8pm on Sunday, October 7, 2007 and transformed into a pedestrian mall lined with vendor booths, artistic displays, refreshments, live demonstrations, children's activities, and more. Two performance areas with stages will be set up to provide music and live performances throughout the event.

Admission: Free

Schedule of Events:

West End Stage
Sponsored by Damon Amusements

Master of Ceremonies:Michele Mortensen

2:00-2:15 Stage Closed for Opening Ceremonies
2:15-2:30 Joseph Carringer Didgeridoo
2:30-3:00 Blue String Marionettes
3:00-3:15 Capoeira Demonstration
3:15-4:00 DJ Alkemi - Dance CRAZE
4:00-4:15 Peacock Players Live Theatre
4:15-5:00 Beats and Sources
(Jay Arsenault)
5:00-5:15 Yellow Taxi Productions - Theatre
5:15-5:45 Kirtan with Keshav
5:45-6:00 Nashua Thearte Guild
6:00-8:00 DJ Nikosi blending Progressive Tech-house, Tech-Breaks and Nasty Dark Techno with live breath percussion by Joe Hemp

East End Stage
Sponsored by Heart of Spirit Healing, LLC, Amethyst Wyldfyre Enterprises, LLC and Greenpro Consulting

Master of Ceremonies:Perry Spearman

2:00-2:15 Opening Ceromony: Mayor Streeter, Amethyst Wyldfyre, Angie D' Anjou
2:15-3:00 Double Yellow Band
3:00-3:10 Historic Walking Tour with Alan Manoian
3:10-3:55 Crazy Jane
3:55-4:05 Tokyo Joe's Martial Arts Demo
4:05-4:50 Full Tilt
4:50-5:00 Historic Walking Tour with Alan Manoian
5:00-5:45 Forgo Famine
5:45-6:00 Martial Atrs Center Kung Fu Demo
6:00-6:45 Emily Rising
6:45-7:00 Zahra Al-Baida - Sword Belly Dance Performance
7:15-8:00 The Uncle Funkle Trio


http://www.firefest.u...

We will meet at the Nashua Public Library and walk over to Pearl Street from there. There is a parking lot at the library.
item.name: Firefest: A Collaborative Street Festival
